DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess pharmacodynamic ( PD ) effect alirocumab serum low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) patient autosomal dominant hypercholesterolemia ( ADH ) gain-of-function mutation ( GOFm ) 1 allele proprotein convertase subtilisin/kexin type 9 ( PCSK9 ) gene loss-of-function mutation ( LOFm ) 1 allele apolipoprotein B-100 gene ( apoB ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Alirocumab ( REGN727/SAR236553 ) Patients With ADH GOFm PCSK9 Gene LOFm apoB Gene
